LanguageData.Apparel_SimpleHelmet.label: simple helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_SimpleHelmet.description: A simple helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons.
LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedHelmet.label: Advanced Helmet
LanguageData.Apparel_AdvancedHelmet.description: A lightweight armored combat helmet that protects your head and ears.
LanguageData.Marine_Helmet.label: Marine Ballistic Helmet
LanguageData.Marine_Helmet.description: A marine helmet designed to protect against ballistics. This is a standard issue item for Colonial Marines.
LanguageData.Jaffa_BasicHelmet.label: Scout Helmet
LanguageData.Jaffa_BasicHelmet.description: This basic scout helmet doesn't offer great protection, but it is lightweight.
LanguageData.USCM_CamoHelmet.label: Camo Ballistic Helmet
LanguageData.USCM_CamoHelmet.description: A camouflaged version of the marine ballistic helmet. It is a standard issue item for Colonial Marines.
LanguageData.Tactical_Helmet.label: Tactical Helmet
LanguageData.Tactical_Helmet.description: A tactical combat helmet used by special forces.
LanguageData.Apparel_PC.label: Peaked cap
LanguageData.Apparel_PC.description: Peaked officer hat. Quite rare these days... Very light and comfy, made out of unknown material. Makes you look like real war hero.
LanguageData.Apparel_Ushanka.label: Cosmic Ushanka
LanguageData.Apparel_Ushanka.description: Thick and soft hat of ancient design used to keep you warm during coldest winters. Slightly more durable than tuque.
LanguageData.Apparello_Medband.label: Medic's Bandana
LanguageData.Apparello_Medband.description: A medic's bandana. It is used to easily point out medics in a crowd.
LanguageData.Apparello_Headset.label: Headset with Bandana
LanguageData.Apparello_Headset.description: Common usage for these has been in communication. It is wireless and doesn't work, but it gives the impression that you're somehow more social!
LanguageData.Apparello_Beret.label: Beret
LanguageData.Apparello_Beret.description: A soft and warm military cap. It is very common amongst off-duty soldiers. Uniforms with berets commonly inspire respect.
LanguageData.WeldingHelmet.label: Welding Helmet
LanguageData.WeldingHelmet.description: A welding helmet is a type of head gear that is used when performing certain types of welding to protect the eyes, face and neck from flash burn, ultraviolet light, sparks, infrared light, and heat.
